policy.xml:
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="Policy Fragment: OTK Authorize JWT Request Validation"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CustomAssertion>
            <L7p:base64SerializedValue></L7p:base64SerializedValue>
        </L7p:CustomAssertion>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${exp}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTc5"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
            </wsp:All>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtleHB9"/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="dateTime"/>
            <L7p:DateOffsetExpression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="exp_formatted"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:DataType variableDataType="dateTime"/>
            <L7p:DateOffsetExpression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="now"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${exp_formatted.seconds}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${now.seconds}"/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="GT"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:Operator operator="GT"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${now.seconds}"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTg0"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="//exp check"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${response_type}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${responseType}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${response_type}"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${response_type}"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTg4"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="//response_type should match with request parameter"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${client_id}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${clientId}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="${client_id}"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${client_id}"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTg5"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="//client_id should match with request parameter"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${resource}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtyZXNvdXJjZX0="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="resourceOriginal"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="//set resourceOriginal if resource is not empty"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${code_challenge}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtjb2RlX2NoYWxsZW5nZX0="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="codeChallenge"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="//set codeChallenge if code_challenge is not empty"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${code_challenge_method}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtjb2RlX2NoYWxsZW5nZV9tZXRob2R9"/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="codeChallengeMethod"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="//set codeChallengeMethod if code_challenge_method is not empty"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${scope}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtzY29wZX0="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="scopeOriginal"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="//set scopeOriginal if scope is not empty"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${max_age}"/>
                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHttYXhfYWdlfQ=="/>
                <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="maxAge"/>
            </L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="//set maxAge if max_age is not empty"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtjbGFpbXN9"/>
                    <L7p:ContentType stringValue="application/json; charset=utf-8"/>
                    <L7p:DataType variableDataType="message"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="claims"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${claims.mainpart}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:ExpressionIsVariable booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                    <L7p:Expression stringValue="$.id_token.acr"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="claims"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="acrJsonPath"/>
                </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHthY3JKc29uUGF0aC5yZXN1bHR9"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="acr_values"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:TrueAssertion/>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="//find & set acr_values"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${claims.mainpart}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:ExpressionIsVariable booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                    <L7p:Expression stringValue="$.id_token.acr.essential"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="claims"/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                    <L7p:VariablePrefix stringValue="acrJsonPath"/>
                </L7p:EvaluateJsonPathExpressionV2>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHthY3JKc29uUGF0aC5yZXN1bHR9"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="acr_values_essential"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:TrueAssertion/>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="//find & set acr_values_essential"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${oauth2_profile.fapi_advanced}"/>
                <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                    <L7p:item dataType="included">
                        <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                        <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Predicates>
            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                    <L7p:Comment stringValue="Addressing the below fapi_advaced validations"/>
                </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Regex>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// replace ","  with space"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:AutoTarget booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="aud"/>
                    <L7p:Regex stringValue="",""/>
                    <L7p:Replace booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Replacement stringValue=" "/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                </L7p:Regex>
                <L7p:Regex>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// replace " ] [ with empty"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:AutoTarget booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="aud"/>
                    <L7p:Regex stringValue="["|\[|\]|]"/>
                    <L7p:Replace booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Replacement stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                </L7p:Regex>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:CustomAssertion>
                        <L7p:base64SerializedValue></L7p:base64SerializedValue>
                    </L7p:CustomAssertion>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTg1"/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="// Audience should contain iss as one of the resources"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${redirect_uri}"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item dataType="included">
                                <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTgz"/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//redirect_uri is not empty"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                        <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${scope}"/>
                        <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                        <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                            <L7p:item dataType="included">
                                <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                            <L7p:item binary="included">
                                <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                                <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                            </L7p:item>
                        </L7p:Predicates>
                    </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:SetVariable>
                            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTgx"/>
                            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                        </L7p:SetVariable>
                        <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <L7p:assertionComment>
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="//scope is not empty"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:assertionComment>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <L7p:Encapsulated>
                        <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                            <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                                <L7p:entry>
                                    <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                                    <L7p:value stringValue="Look for openid scope, (fail if exists)"/>
                                </L7p:entry>
                            </L7p:Properties>
                        </L7p:AssertionComment>
                        <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="f78f0f85-00e2-49b1-95e4-e520df255c9c"/>
                        <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="OTK SCOPE Verification"/>
                        <L7p:Parameters mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="any"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="false"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="custom"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue=""/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="fail"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="true"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="scope.granted"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="${scope}"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="scope.required"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="openid"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Parameters>
                    </L7p:Encapsulated>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${nonce}"/>
                                <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                    <L7p:item dataType="included">
                                    <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                </L7p:Predicates>
                            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                                <L7p:SetVariable>
                                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTgy"/>
                                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                                </L7p:SetVariable>
                                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
                            </wsp:All>
                        </wsp:OneOrMore>
                        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${authzreq.nonce}"/>
                                <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="false"/>
                                <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                </L7p:Predicates>
                            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                                <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${nonce}"/>
                                <L7p:Operator operatorNull="null"/>
                                <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                    <L7p:item dataType="included">
                                    <L7p:Type variableDataType="string"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                    <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="${authzreq.nonce}"/>
                                    </L7p:item>
                                </L7p:Predicates>
                            </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                                <L7p:SetVariable>
                                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTkw"/>
                                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                                </L7p:SetVariable>
                                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
                            </wsp:All>
                        </wsp:OneOrMore>

                                <L7p:value stringValue="// nonce is not empty and should be equal to the request nonce parameter"/>

                <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                    <L7p:Comment stringValue="Shall require the request object to contain an nbf claim that is no longer than 60 minutes in the past"/>
                </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:CommentAssertion>
